body_html: I found there should be bug there. Now my single process app is assigned to use gpu:3, but when i monitor the GPU utilization in "Nvidia X Server Settings" tool, gpu:3 utilization is 0%, but gpu:0 utilization is 5%. That's to say tf.device('/gpu:3'): is not in effect at all.
body_text: I found there should be bug there. Now my single process app is assigned to use gpu:3,  but when i monitor the GPU utilization in  "Nvidia X Server Settings" tool,  gpu:3 utilization is 0%, but gpu:0 utilization is 5%. That's to say  tf.device('/gpu:3'): is not in effect at all.
body: I found there should be bug there. Now my single process app is assigned to use gpu:3,  but when i monitor the GPU utilization in  "Nvidia X Server Settings" tool,  gpu:3 utilization is 0%, but gpu:0 utilization is 5%. That's to say  **tf.device('/gpu:3'):** is not in effect at all.
